name: Access Control Policy
description: Establishes and enforces access control policies for all systems and data

name: Multi-Factor Authentication
description: Requires MFA for all privileged and remote access

name: Least Privilege Access
description: Implements least privilege access principles for all users and service accounts

name: Access Review Process
description: Quarterly review of all user access rights and permissions

name: Configuration Management
description: Maintains baseline configurations for all systems

name: Change Management Process
description: Formal change management process for all production systems

name: Software Inventory
description: Maintains inventory of all authorized software

name: Incident Response Plan
description: Documented incident response plan with defined roles

name: Incident Detection
description: Automated detection of security incidents through SIEM

name: Incident Reporting
description: Process for reporting and escalating security incidents

name: Risk Assessment Program
description: Annual risk assessment program aligned with organizational objectives

name: Vulnerability Management
description: Continuous vulnerability scanning and remediation program

name: Security Awareness Training
description: Annual security awareness training for all employees

name: Role-Based Training
description: Specialized security training for technical staff

name: Physical Access Controls
description: Badge access and monitoring for all facilities

name: Environmental Controls
description: Fire suppression and climate control for data centers

name: Vendor Risk Management
description: Third-party vendor risk assessment program

name: Secure Development
description: Secure software development lifecycle practices

name: Business Continuity Plan
description: Documented business continuity and disaster recovery plan

name: Backup and Recovery
description: Regular backup and tested recovery procedures
